title: The Resistance
description: Charlotte Walker and Fostino Sanchez must now navigate life as part of the SSR...THE RESISTANCE is the sequel to THE UNDESIRABLE, and it is book two in this series. If you loved THE UNDESIRABLE, you'll love where this story heads next. In a world that has no room for childhood games, Charlotte Walker and Fostino Sanchez have conquered every hurdle life has presented. No one would ever mistake these two for "typical" teenagers. That doesn't mean the obstacles haven't come at a cost. Mistrust, stress, fear, self-doubt, resentment, and anger can make for some strange bedfellows. In THE RESISTANCE, Charlotte must answer one question: is she really ready to deal with the consequences of her life? Meanwhile, Fostino must prove to others he is a man who can be trusted. Will their love survive? More importantly, will they? The twists and turns have only just begun.
author: Sara Celi
